languages.text: "За раз поглумилась и над священной верой, и над чужими чувствами. И ни капли стыда, ведьма".
"With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."
languages.original_text: "За раз поглумилась и над священной верой, и над чужими чувствами. И ни капли стыда, ведьма".

traits.locale_text: "With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."
"With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."
"With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."
"With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."
"With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."
"With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."

languages.text: 「たった一言で、信仰も他人の感情も嘲笑ったな。恥知らずな魔女め」
languages.original_text: "With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."

traits.locale_text: 「たった一言で、信仰も他人の感情も嘲笑ったな。恥知らずな魔女め」

languages.text: "Mit einer einzigen Bemerkung habt Ihr den Glauben und die Gefühle anderer verletzt. Ihr kennt wirklich keine Scham, Hexe."
languages.original_text: "With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."

traits.locale_text: "Mit einer einzigen Bemerkung habt Ihr den Glauben und die Gefühle anderer verletzt. Ihr kennt wirklich keine Scham, Hexe."

languages.text: «Con un solo comentario se ha burlado de la fe y de los sentimientos ajenos. En verdad, no tiene vergüenza, bruja».
languages.original_text: "With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."

traits.locale_text: «Con un solo comentario se ha burlado de la fe y de los sentimientos ajenos. En verdad, no tiene vergüenza, bruja».

languages.text: “你的一句话既嘲笑了信仰，又嘲笑了他人的感情。你可真是不知廉耻，女巫。”
languages.original_text: "With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."

traits.locale_text: “你的一句话既嘲笑了信仰，又嘲笑了他人的感情。你可真是不知廉耻，女巫。”

languages.text: "Tek bir sözünle insanların hem inancını hem de duygularını aşağıladın. Gerçekten hiç utanman yok senin cadı."
languages.original_text: "With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."

traits.locale_text: "Tek bir sözünle insanların hem inancını hem de duygularını aşağıladın. Gerçekten hiç utanman yok senin cadı."

languages.original_text: "With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."

languages.text: « Une seule remarque vous a suffi pour tourner en dérision la foi et les sentiments d'autrui. Vous n'avez vraiment honte de rien, sorcière. »
languages.original_text: "With one remark, you have scoffed at both the faith and other people's feelings. You really have no shame, witch."

traits.locale_text: « Une seule remarque vous a suffi pour tourner en dérision la foi et les sentiments d'autrui. Vous n'avez vraiment honte de rien, sorcière. »
